api_connection_failed.title: Unraid Connect API Connection Failed
api_connection_failed.description: The connection to your Unraid server has failed. Error: {error}. This may be due to network issues, incorrect API key, or server problems. Click 'Fix' to test the connection and attempt to resolve the issue.
